alert.note: Alert for La Crosse (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 19 at 10:18PM CDT until May 19 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of west central Wisconsin, including the following county, La Crosse and mainly the city of La Crosse. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1016 PM CDT, Widespread street flooding was reported in La Crosse earlier this evening. The rainfall has since stopped and water levels were allowed to recede. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... La Crosse, French Island, Highway 33 And Losey Boulevard, South Side Of La Crosse and North Side Of La Crosse. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
